post:
So, I have a WorldStream dedicated server here that I don't really need right now so I want to rent it out or sell it completely.
Specs:
Intel C2D E7500 
8GB RAM 
500GB S-ATA2 
50 TB Traffic
CentOS 5.8 32-bit
SLA 1

It has 100 mbps port on it, 50 TB incoming/outgoing/month.

Images(from putty):
http://puu.sh/1ks4H
http://puu.sh/1ks4O
http://puu.sh/1ks7H

Price per slot: $25

**Fair Usage**
